title: Alone in Love
description: Jasmine Davis has just been given the opportunity of a lifetime... a change to work with her longtime crush Mason Alexander. Not only is Mason the most gorgeous man she's ever seen, he's one of the country's most successful men under 30. If only should could talk to him without stammering and stuttering.  Mason Alexander finds himself in a bind. He has an opportunity to renovate one of the most coveted vacation resorts in the world, but his project manager quit at the last minute. Left without any other options, he hires Jasmine Davis, a recent college graduate who happens to be his sister's quirky best friend. After he unknowingly breaks her heart to pieces, Jasmine decides she won't be his doormat any longer, ultimately forcing Mason to see the beauty that was been right in front of him the entire time.
author: Charlotte Dinnis
